snippet.title: MixMob: Uprising - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A rogue A.I. deleted our culture and it’s up to us to get it back! Mask Up as a member of the MixMob to reclaim and remix our world from a Card Battle Racing Game to a full MMO and beyond. Along the journey experience NFTs, culture magazines, deep lore, storytelling with UGC at its core. As you progress with your MixBots and NFT collections, the world will behold the power of your style and skill — both in the game and IRL. 

This is the official trailer for the upcoming project from MixMob. For more info check out MixMob.io. Our unique card-battle game MixMob: Uprising is Clash Royale meets Mario Kart. Projected kick off date, April 2022.

Experience the world’s first-ever card battle racing game with MixMob: Racer 1. Compete in tournaments for glory and rewards on the journey to save humanity from the rogue AI, HELIX-9. Unleash the power of your Masks and MixBots to become a racing legend! From the minds behind Halo, Battlefield, FIFA, and Nintendo.

Start racing! - https://www.mixmob.io

Join our community:
Discord: Join the MixMob Discord Server! - https://discord.com/invite/mixmob 
Twitter: MixMobOrigin - https://twitter.com/MixMobOrigin
